mapper.insert: INSERT INTO feed ( userID, photoPath1, photoPath2, photoPath3, photoPath4, content, date, likeCnt ) VALUES ( #{userID}, #{photoPath1}, #{photoPath2}, #{photoPath3}, #{photoPath4}, #{content}, #{date}, #{likeCnt} )
mapper.select: SELECT feedID, userID, photoPath1, content, date, likeCnt FROM feed A RIGHT JOIN follow B ON A.userID = B.targetID WHERE B.sourceID = #{userID} ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT A.feedID, A.userID, photoPath1, content, date, likeCnt FROM feed A RIGHT JOIN likefeed B ON A.feedID = B.feedID WHERE B.userID = #{userID} ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM feed ORDER BY date DESC
select * from likefeed WHERE feedID = #{feedID} AND userID = #{userID}
